title: Best of The Herd: 06/26/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 06/26/2019
description:
Colin thinks KD is seeking validation which is why he is leaving a great team like the Warriors for the Knicks or Nets.  He predicts where all of the top free agents will end up.  Former Thunder, Knicks and Blazers Forward Enes Kanter comes in studio to explain why KD should choose the Knicks over the Nets.  Plus, why the NFL MVP odds tell you why the Giants screwed up so badly 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
